headline: Spindrift Sparkling Water Nears Sale to Private-Equity Firm
summary: Spindrift Beverage is in advanced talks to be sold to a private-equity firm for upward of $650 million, according to people familiar with the matter.  San Francisco-based Gryphon Investors is in talks to acquire the bubbly-water maker following a competitive auction, and a deal could be announced before the end of the year, provided the discussions don’t hit any last-minute snags, the people said.  The deal is expected to value Spindrift at upward of $650 million, the people said.
